Literature.Title: Design of Next Generation Polymyxins with Lower Toxicity: The Discovery of SPR206
Literature.Author: Brown P, Abbott E, Abdulle O, Boakes S, Coleman S, Divall N, Duperchy E, Moss S, Rivers D, Simonovic M, Singh J, Stanway S, Wilson A, Dawson MJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 4352(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii NCTC 13424(MIC=>8µg/ml)
